body_html:
Issue was fixed by upgrading to gcc/g++ 4.9.2.
Didn't need to use the --spawn_strategy=standalone flag anymore.

Compiled with:
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer

body:
Issue was fixed by upgrading to gcc/g++ 4.9.2.
Didn't need to use the --spawn_strategy=standalone flag anymore.

Compiled with:
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
